title_en: ProImage-Bench: Rubric-Based Evaluation for Professional Image Generation
title_zh: ProImage-Bench：基于量规的专业图像生成评估
summary_en: We study professional image generation, where a model must synthesize information-dense, scientifically precise illustrations from technical descriptions rather than merely produce visually plausible pictures. To quantify the progress, we introduce ProImage-Bench, a rubric-based benchmark that targets biology schematics, engineering/patent drawings, and general scientific diagrams. For 654 figures collected from real textbooks and technical reports, we construct detailed image instructions and a hierarchy of rubrics that decompose correctness into 6,076 criteria and 44,131 binary checks. Rubrics are derived from surrounding text and reference figures using large multimodal models, and are evaluated by an automated LMM-based judge with a principled penalty scheme that aggregates sub-question outcomes into interpretable criterion scores. We benchmark several representative text-to-image models on ProImage-Bench and find that, despite strong open-domain performance, the best base model reaches only 0.791 rubric accuracy and 0.553 criterion score overall, revealing substantial gaps in fine-grained scientific fidelity. Finally, we show that the same rubrics provide actionable supervision: feeding failed checks back into an editing model for iterative refinement boosts a strong generator from 0.653 to 0.865 in rubric accuracy and from 0.388 to 0.697 in criterion score. ProImage-Bench thus offers both a rigorous diagnostic for professional image generation and a scalable signal for improving specification-faithful scientific illustrations.
summary_zh: 本研究聚焦于专业图像生成，其要求模型必须依据技术描述合成信息密集、科学精确的插图，而非仅生成视觉上合理的图片。为量化该领域的进展，我们提出了ProImage-Bench，这是一个基于量规的基准测试，针对生物学示意图、工程/专利图纸以及一般科学图表。我们从真实的教科书和技术报告中收集了654幅图例，构建了详细的图像生成指令和一个分层量规体系，该体系将正确性分解为6,076项标准和44,131项二元检查。这些量规通过大型多模态模型从周边文本和参考图像中推导得出，并由一个基于LMM的自动化评估器进行评判，该评估器采用一种原则性的扣分方案，将子问题结果汇总为可解释的标准得分。我们在ProImage-Bench上对几种具有代表性的文生图模型进行了基准测试，结果发现，尽管这些模型在开放域表现强劲，但最佳基础模型的整体量规准确率仅为0.791，标准得分仅为0.553，揭示了其在细粒度科学保真度方面存在显著差距。最后，我们证明同一套量规能提供可操作的监督：将未通过的检查反馈给编辑模型进行迭代优化，可将一个强生成器的量规准确率从0.653提升至0.865，标准得分从0.388提升至0.697。因此，ProImage-Bench既为专业图像生成提供了严格的诊断工具，也为改进符合规范的科学插图提供了可扩展的优化信号。
